descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course introduces students to technical, aesthetic, and theoretical components of media construction, including narrative, sound, image, and editing. Through lectures, assignments, in-class screenings, discussions, and accompanying technical lab sessions, students will gain a good understanding of the fundamentals of filmmaking. Students will work on both group and individual projects.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: The Visual Story: Creating the Visual Structure of Film, TV and Digital Media (2nd ed). Block, Bruce. Focal Press, 2008.
